00019 #define PANDORA_RETURN_RESULT_IF(StatusCode1, Operator, Command)                                        \
00020 {                                                                                                       \
00021     const pandora::StatusCode statusCode(Command);                                                      \
00022     if (statusCode Operator StatusCode1)                                                                \
00023     {                                                                                                   \
00024         std::cout << #Command << " return " << StatusCodeToString(statusCode) << std::endl;             \
00025         std::cout << "    in function: " << __FUNCTION__ << std::endl;                                  \
00026         std::cout << "    in file:     " << __FILE__ << " line#: " << __LINE__ << std::endl;            \
00027         return statusCode;                                                                              \
00028     }                                                                                                   \
00029 }
00030 
00031 #define PANDORA_RETURN_RESULT_IF_AND_IF(StatusCode1, StatusCode2, Operator, Command)                    \
00032 {                                                                                                       \
00033     const pandora::StatusCode statusCode(Command);                                                      \
00034     if ((statusCode Operator StatusCode1) && (statusCode Operator StatusCode2))                         \
00035     {                                                                                                   \
00036         std::cout << #Command << " return " << StatusCodeToString(statusCode) << std::endl;             \
00037         std::cout << "    in function: " << __FUNCTION__ << std::endl;                                  \
00038         std::cout << "    in file:     " << __FILE__ << " line#: " << __LINE__ << std::endl;            \
00039         return statusCode;                                                                              \
00040     }                                                                                                   \
00041 }
00042 
00043 #define PANDORA_THROW_RESULT_IF(StatusCode1, Operator, Command)                                         \
00044 {                                                                                                       \
00045     const pandora::StatusCode statusCode(Command);                                                      \
00046     if (statusCode Operator StatusCode1)                                                                \
00047     {                                                                                                   \
00048         std::cout << #Command << " throw " << StatusCodeToString(statusCode) << std::endl;              \
00049         std::cout << "    in function: " << __FUNCTION__ << std::endl;                                  \
00050         std::cout << "    in file:     " << __FILE__ << " line#: " << __LINE__ << std::endl;            \
00051         throw pandora::StatusCodeException(statusCode);                                                 \
00052     }                                                                                                   \
00053 }
00054 
00055 #define PANDORA_THROW_RESULT_IF_AND_IF(StatusCode1, StatusCode2, Operator, Command)                     \
00056 {                                                                                                       \
00057     const pandora::StatusCode statusCode(Command);                                                      \
00058     if ((statusCode Operator StatusCode1) && (statusCode Operator StatusCode2))                         \
00059     {                                                                                                   \
00060         std::cout << #Command << " throw " << StatusCodeToString(statusCode) << std::endl;              \
00061         std::cout << "    in function: " << __FUNCTION__ << std::endl;                                  \
00062         std::cout << "    in file:     " << __FILE__ << " line#: " << __LINE__ << std::endl;            \
00063         throw pandora::StatusCodeException(statusCode);                                                 \
00064     }                                                                                                   \
00065 }

00069 namespace pandora
00070 {
00071 
00072 #define STATUS_CODE_TABLE(d)                                                                            \
00073     d(STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS,                  "STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS"                   )                   \
00074     d(STATUS_CODE_FAILURE,                  "STATUS_CODE_FAILURE"                   )                   \
00075     d(STATUS_CODE_NOT_FOUND,                "STATUS_CODE_NOT_FOUND"                 )                   \
00076     d(STATUS_CODE_NOT_INITIALIZED,          "STATUS_CODE_NOT_INITIALIZED"           )                   \
00077     d(STATUS_CODE_ALREADY_INITIALIZED,      "STATUS_CODE_ALREADY_INITIALIZED"       )                   \
00078     d(STATUS_CODE_ALREADY_PRESENT,          "STATUS_CODE_ALREADY_PRESENT"           )                   \
00079     d(STATUS_CODE_OUT_OF_RANGE,             "STATUS_CODE_OUT_OF_RANGE"              )                   \
00080     d(STATUS_CODE_NOT_ALLOWED,              "STATUS_CODE_NOT_ALLOWED"               )                   \
00081     d(STATUS_CODE_INVALID_PARAMETER,        "STATUS_CODE_INVALID_PARAMETER"         )                   \
00082     d(STATUS_CODE_UNCHANGED,                "STATUS_CODE_UNCHANGED"                 )
00083 
00087 #define GET_STATUS_CODE_ENUM_ENTRY(a, b)                                                                \
00088     a,
00089 
00093 #define GET_STATUS_CODE_NAME_SWITCH(a, b)                                                               \
00094     case a : return b;
00095 
00099 enum StatusCode
00100 {
00101     STATUS_CODE_TABLE(GET_STATUS_CODE_ENUM_ENTRY)
00102     NUMBER_OF_STATUS_CODES
00103 };
00104 
00110 std::string StatusCodeToString(const StatusCode statusCode);
00111

00113 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00114 
00118 class StatusCodeException : public std::exception
00119 {
00120 public:
00126     StatusCodeException(const StatusCode statusCode);
00127 
00131     ~StatusCodeException() throw();
00132 
00138     StatusCode GetStatusCode() const;
00139 
00145     std::string ToString() const;
00146 
00152     const std::string &GetBackTrace() const;
00153 
00154 private:
00155     const StatusCode    m_statusCode;   
00156     std::string         m_backTrace;    
00157 };
00158 
00159 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00160 
00161 inline StatusCodeException::StatusCodeException(const StatusCode statusCode) :
00162     m_statusCode(statusCode)
00163 {
00164 #if defined(__GNUC__) && defined(BACKTRACE)
00165     const size_t maxDepth = 100;
00166     void *stackAddresses[maxDepth];
00167 
00168     size_t stackDepth = backtrace(stackAddresses, maxDepth);
00169     char **stackStrings = backtrace_symbols(stackAddresses, stackDepth);
00170 
00171     m_backTrace = "\nBackTrace\n    ";
00172 
00173     for (size_t i = 1; i < stackDepth; ++i)
00174     {
00175         m_backTrace += stackStrings[i];
00176         m_backTrace += "\n    ";
00177     }
00178 
00179     free(stackStrings); // malloc()ed by backtrace_symbols
00180 #endif
00181 }
00182 
00183 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00184 
00185 inline StatusCodeException::~StatusCodeException() throw()
00186 {
00187 }
00188 
00189 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00190 
00191 inline StatusCode StatusCodeException::GetStatusCode() const
00192 {
00193     return m_statusCode;
00194 }
00195 
00196 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00197 
00198 inline std::string StatusCodeException::ToString() const
00199 {
00200     return StatusCodeToString(m_statusCode);
00201 }
00202 
00203 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00204 
00205 inline const std::string &StatusCodeException::GetBackTrace() const
00206 {
00207     return m_backTrace;
00208 }

00212 
00213 inline std::string StatusCodeToString(const StatusCode statusCode)
00214 {
00215     switch (statusCode)
00216     {
00217         STATUS_CODE_TABLE(GET_STATUS_CODE_NAME_SWITCH)
00218         default : throw StatusCodeException(STATUS_CODE_INVALID_PARAMETER);
00219     }
00220 }
00221
